website_summaries.verdict: A budget smartphone that's a great starter phone for young people or ideal for anyone who only needs the basic features.
pros: 12 MP rear camera and 8 MP front camera take decent photos, considering the low price of the phone
Battery can last up to 3 days on a full charge

website_summaries.verdict: Best option for travelers who spend most of their time in cities, as it’s unlocked to work with most carriers and has a long battery life.
pros: Water-repellent design allows the phone to withstand occasional splashes, rain, and moisture exposure
Fingerprint reader provides added security, and if it’s stolen, thieves won’t be able to access sensitive information easily
cons: Despite claims, the phone won’t work for WiFi calling on ATT or Verizon networks due to its firmware

website_summaries.verdict: With its 5G support, durability, and extra-long battery life, the Moto z4 was designed for reliability wherever your adventures take you.

customer_reviews.title: Telephone Connectivity Problem
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem. The phone loses telephone connectivity, LTE and 3G. This never happened with any of my other phones. After I bought the Power I experienced the problem with telephone connectivity so I returned the phone and got another one. You see,,, I'm a sucker for battery life. That said, the 2d phone exhibits the same problem. I visited my carrier who swapped the SIM card. I wanted to rule out that the SIM card was causing the problem. No change. It's the phone. What to do? Oh yeah, by the way, the battery life is top notch and the phone does everything else well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in NYC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - Microphone sucks
customer_reviews.text: A smartphone is still expected to include a BASIC phone in it. and a basic phone is meant for doing one simple thing, to let us TALK. The phone can be a simple basic phone or a smartphone, or a fancy super phone or mega/giga phone, but if we cannot talk over it, it should be called a piece of junk. The microphone on this device is very weak. It stops intermittently, and you end up hearing "hello hello hello" from the other person because he cannot hear you since your microphone is down.
customer_reviews.author: RAMBO

customer_reviews.title: Questionable cellular reception
customer_reviews.text: Writing review after 24 hours. Verizon rep put new sim card and phone and was curious why it was only getting 3G in 4G service area. Was riding bike today and phone was hanging up while streaming YouTube and then Pandora due to connectivity issues. Was never a problem with my old moto. Re-installed sim and will give it one more day then it goes back if problem continues. Update after 48 hours: changing to 4-stars. Software auto-updated and currently getting LTE.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Sigmon

customer_reviews.title: Works with Verizon..
customer_reviews.text: This battery is way too awesome... Had a Moto turbo 2 and this way beats it's battery... Wish it had wireless charging and a shatterproof screen but nice phone... Works with Verizon. I'm prepay and no issues except better reception...
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Quality phone.
customer_reviews.text: Loved my Moto X, repair shop ruined it. Quickly found and ordered this G7 Power, came in overnite, set it up myself, works correctly. Excellent clear screen, still trying to figure out added features. Half the price of my Moto X with 1" larger screen.
customer_reviews.author: MR R.

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase if you value security updates
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this device on June 11th and it was naturally still on the factory January 1st security patch. Once setting the phone up the phone refuses to update despite there being two security updates since launch. Posting on the Motorola forum gets no response from Motorola. Calling them directly you get lied to saying that they "aren't aware of the issue." Just do a search for this issue. Tell me how many people are furious about this. I will be returning this phone and NEVER purchasing a Motorola or Lenovo product EVER again. I'm sick of companies that have abysmal customer service. AVOID LIKE THE PLAGUE!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Cusack

customer_reviews.title: Might Do Better at a Phone Store
customer_reviews.text: Good Phone, But... caller blocking and Text sender Blocking does Not Work the way the owners manual says it should, you will be Unable to block callers whom you wish to block, and Unable to block people from whom you don't want to receive texts. This could be a problem. I had to install an app to block unwanted callers and some Still get through. My previous phones have this simple feature. This phone claims to have these features, but when accessing the Menu, those options simply are not there. Maybe that is why the price was lower? Next time I'll go to a Phone Store in person, and make sure the phone I buy has these features
customer_reviews.author: Karr Knutt

customer_reviews.title: 1 year Update!
customer_reviews.text: THE CONNECTION ON THIS PHONE SUCKS! The battery has already started to deteriorate. I haven't even finished the year with the phone and i already want a different phone. I never had so many connection issues with a phone before. BAD ANTENNAS.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: 5000 mah battery life is excellent
customer_reviews.text: I use this phone for email, text, web surfing, and ~15-20 phone calls per day. After 12 hours of this type of usage, the 5000mah battery still has between 70-80% remaining.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: This phone was a replacement for an older model. Unfortunately, I can't hear the voices when someone calls me. I wasted an hour on the phone with Motorola's support but it wasn't fixed. I ordered ANOTHER one and it's fine. I'd like to return the original one that doesn't work OR have motorola fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Myra

customer_reviews.title: Buy it , upgraded from a T-Mobile Moto e4 plus worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Buy it..I had a Moto e4 plus on T-Mobile NYC , Brooklyn. I upgraded to this phone and it works great , good reception , great battery life and the screen looks great and Android runs really smooth and GPS was good too I am really impressed, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: solanoandroidpower

customer_reviews.title: Drops my calls like crazy
customer_reviews.text: The most important thing a phone does is make and receive calls. In both cases, this phone drops calls like I've never seen. It is clearly on my end, the phone actually beeps and everything, like if I hung up. I thought maybe the "end call" button on the screen gets touched, so I hold it way away from my face and it still drops calls. It often has a full signal too. Since my last phone didn't drop calls, I can only assume it's this phone only and not the carrier. This is a travesty and at the moment I cannot afford a new phone. Motorola and Lenovo should be ashamed.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Not getting same coverage as with old Moto phone in the same location, home.  Lucky if I get 1 bar.
customer_reviews.text: Update: not getting the same coverage with this phone as I did with an older model Moto phone. Only get one bar at my house, if lucky, and used to get 4 with old phone. Drops in middle of call, losing signal that I never had issues before. Don't know if just a "one off" bad phone or bad design. Power cord supplied is extremely short. Also, you cannot use a common c type cord, this phone requires a unique c plug, therefore you cannot use any other devices power cord with this phone. If you want a second cord, you will have to buy a second one. Slot where you plug in to the phone seems really loose.
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: The G7 may be good at performing other functions, but as a telephone it is mediocre. A modern phone should have excellent visual voice mail capability. The G7 does not provide this excellence. The speaker provides very poor quality sound. The battery life is good, but it should be. A big phone has room for a big battery. The screen quality is acceptable. The camera is acceptable. The poor basic telecommunications functionality is a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: CDMA or GSM
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a cdma model to be used with Verizon, went to the Verizon store to swap my old phone and was told this new phone would not work on their system. It is evidently a gsm model which is no good to me.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Ellis

customer_reviews.title: I forgot when I charged it last time.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for battery life and it is AWESOME. Don't expect it would be a high-end super smartphone but it does the job pretty well. I didn't have any problem with LTE on the US mobile. The only problem I have is with sound, don't know how to switch between the loudspeaker and the regular one. Worth the money. Recommend if you want an average smartphone with GREAT battery life. Update: Updating it to 5 stars. I hit it so hard on the floor twice and it didn't crack, no scratches. Although the body bent a little bit from the impact. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Aibek

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: It has been a week, but I am really, REALLY impressed. My last phone was the Pixel XL and the battery was garbage. The charge lasts forever and it's super recharge speed is fast! Don't compare specs with other phones, the screen is beautiful. Sound quality on all ends is great. There is no lag and plays all my games no problem. I know the Google pixel camera is known to be one of the best...but this camera has the SAME 12 mega pixel camera and plenty of technology to make the pictures look great.
customer_reviews.author: Jafar

customer_reviews.title: VALUE smartphone
customer_reviews.text: Got this to activate on T Mobile by switching the SIM card from my Droid Turbo 2 into this Moto G7. Switched with zero problems. I'm very impressed with the battery life, screen quality, camera, etc. Really great value for the money. Makes me feel like a fool for ever spending $1,000 on a new phone!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: UNBELIEVABLE......
customer_reviews.text: Update....08)11/2019 This phone is AWESOME!!!! I haven't found a phone with the super battery life as the Moto Power 7. I recently purchased the Samsung Galaxy S10 5G and ended up returning it. I can't believe the power this phone has...... The battery life is incredible....I go two days easily without worrying about plugging it in. Picture, speed, phone quality are surprisingly fantastic. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Botanique Baron Samedi

customer_reviews.title: Choose Wisely
customer_reviews.text: The phone is ok but Motorola needs.to improve alot to their phones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great basic phone
customer_reviews.text: This is my first smartphone so I can't compare it to other phones, but this is all I need. It's not that I'm technophobic, it's just that I always wait until newer technology becomes cheap and loaded with features. This phone fits the bill and is easy to operate. I already spend way too much time on my laptop, so I'm hoping this phone stays in my pocket and mainly comes out for utilitarian tasks. :D Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: tommy t

customer_reviews.title: Best of the G7 series
customer_reviews.text: I came from the the E4 Plus which has a large battery too. I tried the Moto G7 and came away with 2 issues. Dim screen and poor battery life. I could not live with turning screen to 100 brightness and charging 2-3 times a day. The Moto G7 Power is great. Battery will easily last all day. Screen is much brighter than the G7. Camera is good and call quality is super.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Finally.  Somebody made the phone I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a charging cable at my desk at work, in my truck, in the kitchen, on my nightstand, and one in my backpack. Funny thing is I ordered extra cables (Type-C) at the same time I got this phone and those new charging cables are still in the package. My day starts around 5:30am and ends between 11pm and midnight. At that point my battery life is usually still up around 40-50%, sometimes even higher, without touching a charging cable all day. Instead of calling this the G7 Power, they should have named it the G7 Freedom. Get this phone and ditch all those extra cables in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert_Sundevil

customer_reviews.title: Motorola Moto G7 Power
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone, I have come into the the twentyfirst century. Battery last for hours, plenty of space for pictures, videos and games. Wasn't sure at first, just had to get use to it and still learning. Recommend for all Android users. Additional info: I notice a lot of people are having connection problems with Verizon. I have AT&T and have had no problems at all Still in love with the phone.
customer_reviews.author: DZj

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for $
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my phone after using it for a few weeks. The finger print reader is in the back. At first I didn't like it but you just hold the phone like normal and it turns on and let's you in, so now I love it. The camera is also better than I expected for the money. And the battery life is fantastic without having to carry around a big, honkin device.
customer_reviews.author: Tim and Lori

customer_reviews.title: you simply pull your hair out trying to hear people you're on the phone with
customer_reviews.text: Honestly everything was perfect with phone. 5 stars no question. UNTIL YOU HAVE TO MAKE A PHONE CALL. I MEAN THE AMOUNT OF EFFORT NEEDED STRAINING TO HEAR WHO YOU'RE TALKING TO MADE IT A VERY EASY DECISION TO RETURN IT. HEY if you're looking for a phone where you're not gonna have to make calls or listen to anything this phones perfect. Unfortunately I kind of need to be able to hear things from my phone. Sad cause I was very excited for this phone.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Glitch glitch glitch
customer_reviews.text: This phone is super quiet! We got it for our business phone and it barely rings and I cant hear the notifications at all. Also, nearly everytime I'm having a conversation it turns the screen on and starts dialing out or puts me on speaker with my cheek! It's really a pain in the butt! No reception when my samsung is fine... only good part is the battery. I'm sorry I missed my return window, this thing glitches....bad....
customer_reviews.author: Kellianne Counts

customer_reviews.title: Received a lemon-flavored brick
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a week, then it bricked. The week it worked it was fantastic - almost 4 days on one charge. However, today it will not power up regardless of what I or Amazon support try. I was advised that this item is not available for replacement, so Amazon has sent me a return label and will issue a refund once the item is received. I will buy this model again, as it might just be stupid bad luck on my part and I received a lemon, and I really was liking the phone. II will update my review once I have done that, but for now a bricked phone is 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone as an upgrade from a super old phone. I love all the memory and the battery life is great. I use my phone all day long, pretty steadily and have never had to charge it before going to bed. So much memory! Coming from a phone with 16GB, I'm able to download lots of games and things run smoothly. My one complaint is an issue with connecting my Bluetooth speaker. The phone doesn't like connecting, sometimes takes a while, freezes up and occasionally will restart itself. Screen size is great, sound is great. I'm happy almost two months in. Would definitely recommend. I've always had great experiences with Motorola phones.
customer_reviews.author: AnitaR

customer_reviews.title: Factory seconds or something
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace an existing Moto G7 power because I had shattered the glass and Verizon was no longer carrying it. I loved my original one and kick myself for failing to replace the screen protector after a prior mishap. From day one, this new phone has not performed aww well as the original one; most notably battery life is a fraction of what I was accustomed to. Also, the phone glitches and I have to hard reboot at times. I haven't had it a month, but hate to deal with the hall of returning and getting it set with for Verizon again.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Moto G FOREVER!!! Moto G7 Power
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Moto G with an unfortunate, poor decision made Iphone in between. I will never, ever, ever buy anything other than a Moto G. I use for basic needs, phone, text, internet. The battery life on Moto G is bar none phenomenal!! For me, and I would believe most, that is a huge priority. The set up & navigation is great & simple as well. The screen field is great at 6.2. I highly, highly, highly recommend Moto G. Don't be an Isheep and waste money. Moto G products offer much superior quality at lower cost & you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This phone is amazing. The battery life is stupid amazing. I can go a few days without charging depending on my useage. Fingerprint scanner works great. It seems to have enough storage and RAM for me. Highly recommend over a more expensive phone that will probably last just as long. Only down side is the charging port is different than most Android's so I had to order extra cords on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Johnson Family

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Phone (and not just for the price)
customer_reviews.text: I was coming from a Pixel 2 with a broken screen and needed a cheap last minute phone, so I went with this guy... And it's been totally amazing. The price is a fraction of a pixel or iphone and the battery lasts three times as long. I'm still blown away every night looking at the battery level. I should say the speed/camera/sensors are all not perfect but they're totally acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: E J.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolute steel. Had s7 bought new in Jan 2017, and battery life was gone. Don't like being at mercy of any company so looked for alternatives from Verizon store. This is IT. arrived grabbed old phone pulled Sim put in g7 turned old phone on and automatically promoted transfer. This "cheap" phone out performs s7 on all fronts (battery x10, reception, screen size, etc etc). Now I'm still month to month with Verizon and can leave anytime if my circumstances change. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Battery for days, even with heavy use
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my YouTube/Twitch addicted roommate to replace a dying iPhone 7. Heavy use and the battery goes for 2-ish days. When idle it only needs a charge every 3+ days. Pretty amazing. All we did was pull the SIM from the iPhone with the SIM tray key and pop it into the new phone. Call quality is good, and all the stock Android features are there. The screen is passable, not OLED glory like expensive phones but good enough really, made up for by its size. Haven't had any problems with it!
customer_reviews.author: Levantine

customer_reviews.title: Great phone Great battery life Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these phones during prime days for the family and have used for a month all three have performed perfectly I'm always joking asking if you charged your phone. My daughter does the Pokemon go and she tires way before the phone. We are very happy with the phone. I have been getting my security updates. And it does take great pictures. We are with T-Mobile and the phone has Wi-Fi Calling and works well on the network.
customer_reviews.author: D. Edinger

customer_reviews.title: nice phone, exceptional battery life
customer_reviews.text: I like the G line of Motorola phones in general, but this one is designed to hold an extra-large battery and it really works. I don't watch much video, but I use my phone a fair bit for podcasts and music and normal phone things, and I can often go four days between charges if I fully charge it. Which I usually don't because I think current generation batteries prefer not to be too charged or too discharged, and with this phone its easy to do that and still have plenty of battery available.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M. Wilbert

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Phone with Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: This phone is exactly what I was looking for. It does not have all of the bloatware that the utility company likes to stick on phones that it sells you. The battery life is phenomenal. The phone also works very well in weak signal areas which is a need for me. The fingerprint option is not a selling point for me so I have never used it and I don't intend to use it. I can't say enough good things about the phone. My service is AT&T where they claim they encourage Bring Your Own Phone, but I still needed to be assertive as I was replacing a dead phone and not opening a new contract.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing photos, great battery life
customer_reviews.text: Had to get it due to broken old phone of 10 years. That's right, Samsung Note 2 used. Loved it. Did not want to pay a mortgage for a phone. Cost me $270. It's GUI feels like it was made by Disney. Very immature menus, designed by really young kids. Not recommend if your a heavy user. Photos is the most disappointing. But for the price I guess I can't complain. And the battery is awesome. Four days to a week before powering up. If money saving is the goal, it's the best. Hope that helps.
customer_reviews.author: HD Bru

customer_reviews.title: Great phone with major flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Update: after much manually updating APN settings issue is resolved. Phone does not auto setup APN easily. Phone is good with great battery life. Major flaw is many oncoming calls go straight to voicemail. After some research this is happening to others. Might need to return this.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Value!
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is phenomenal! The camera is outstanding, even creating 4k videos! Using a micro SD card, the phone does give you the option of formatting it as a standard memory card, or as an extension of internal storage.(adaptable storage). Even though the front display is Corning Gorilla Glass 3, the case is still glass, so definitely get a good case for it. AND the PRICE! You can have your IPhones and Samsungs.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Bought for the battery life, still happy
customer_reviews.text: My #1 issue with my old phones was battery life. This phone is not only cheap, but has a big a$$ battery that won't quite. I can now easily keep it between the suggested 20-80% charge, so the battery won't age too fast. Overall a very fine mid-end phone. The only thing lacking for me is the camera, which is sub-par for the even this price I think. Pros: * Amazing battery * Most new Tmobile bands * Headphone jack * Good placement of fingerprint sensor Cons: * Camera is very mediocre * Due to notch, notification area width is very small
customer_reviews.author: Toozinger

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR VERIZON!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I got it was because it said it was for Verizon, clearly stated in the red circle that it was for Verizon phone, and unlocked. This has been a nightmare!!!!! THIS IS ABSOLUTELY NOT FOR VERIZON!!!!!! Its been 11 weeks sense I returned the phone, just now got confirmation of my refund being processed. It will take about 10 business days to receive it. Not to mention the month I had to wait to get the phone in the first place, only to find out it was completely useless for me, because it wasn't unlocked, and it wasn't setup for Verizon. The phone itself was very nice. Just completely useless for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: My Moto G4 had a bulging battery and was stuck on Android 7. This is a great upgrade for less than $200. I'm not using the face recognition, but the fingerprint reader works great. I have it set so I can open with either my left or right hand. I have an iPhone Xr for my job. This phone is just as useful and lot more reasonably priced. Plus you can increase onboard storage with a micro SD card.
customer_reviews.author: MFA

customer_reviews.title: Overall slightly disappointing as it struggles with wifi calls
customer_reviews.text: Hit or miss whether this thing will place a wifi call. People have also complained my voice gets chopped up to be unintelligible when I'm 5 feet from the wifi router. Also NO indication whether you're connected to wifi or the cell network which can really eat up your data if you're loading apps or sending large pictures. Caused me to eat up a month of data 2 weeks early. PAIN. Great battery life and display is very good in full sun. Camera is phenomenal in HDR mode but lacks detail when zooming in. Probably wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Camper Van Beethoven

customer_reviews.title: Good budget phone, but Verizon customers may need to let it update fully first before activation.
customer_reviews.text: A good budget phone at $219 when I purchased it. Great battery life. Just a warning to fellow Verizon carrier customers, let this phone update first before transferring your sim card. I was at the Verizon store for roughly an hour trying to get this phone to work. Before leaving they were only able to get the phone calling function to work, no mobile data (I was under an unlimited plan). Ultimately after I did a factory reset on the phone I let it update (took around 15+ minutes) to the most recent update and popped in the sim card and it works fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FINGERPRINT READER STOPPED WORKING AFTER A MONTH, NEARLY IMPOSSIBLE TO MAKE ANY CALLS EVER
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly disappointing...I thought I had gotten a great phone when it came in, fingerprint reader was lightning fast and everything worked great. I’ve only had it about a month and the fingerprint reader has already stopped working completely. Also, the phone feature on this thing RARELY ever works...so most of the time this “phone” can’t even make calls...it also randomly doesn’t receive all texts so prepare for serious miscommunication in your conversations. ABSOLUTE TRASH. I’m just glad I got the protection plan so I can hopefully get rid of this complete POS. FYI I’m using the Visible phone service.
customer_reviews.author: Alexnder Kristelle

customer_reviews.title: Bad speaker phone
customer_reviews.text: Speaker on this phone is extremely low. I noticed this on my G6 also. i figured I'd upgrade thinking I blew the speaker on the G6. I thought I was having hearing loss till I heard my brother LG and my wife's Apple. I don't recommend this phone or the g6 if your after a good speaker phone. Thats the only issue I have with the g6 and g7.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could be perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love the phone, love the battery life but I'm horribly disappointed that there is no wifi calling capability. Update: Dropped the phone the other day, a couple of feet onto the ground. Now, the microphone doesn't work. Since they can't be taken apart it's a $250 drop. Bummer
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D. Timm

customer_reviews.title: Great phone Great battery
customer_reviews.text: One of the best phones I have ever owned. I have iPhones since the 3G but after my 6s finally died on me I got this as what I thought would be a place holder phone until no settled on my next iOS device. I LOVE this phone I'm most likely never going to own an iPhone again. I love my iOS devices but I have numerous iPads and even a gen 1 iPad, so I'm not going to miss iOS on my phone. Android on this phone is quite stock and it is nice, a small learning curve but it is pretty easy to pick up. Oh yeah and the battery lasts 2-3 days with normal use...
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone, meh camera.
customer_reviews.text: Got this phone for my boyfriend. He loves it! Not the best for photos, but definitely worth the purchase with all the features it has being an android. Facial recognition is superb and I love watching him shake the phone to turn the flashlight on. So much cooler than any boring iPhone that’s for sure! Android phones just have so much more customizable features and personality. It almost feels like a new addition to our growing family! Make room, guinea pig, we got a MOTO G7 in this house now!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Won't download apps
customer_reviews.text: I had many problems with the google play store downloading apps. It refused to download saying "Download pending" for hours even after data cache was cleared and I factory reset the phone-same with the replacement from Motorola. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE
customer_reviews.text: This phone is powerful and has great battery life. The screen quality is just fine by my standards but I understand there are better displays on more expensive phones. The moto actions are a nice little extra that helps with things like flashlight mode and turning on the camera. It powers all the applications I need to run and has plenty of storage space, including an option for a microSD card. If you don't have the budget for a more expensive phone, this is a great alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Timber Merchant

customer_reviews.title: It's a good temporary phone.
customer_reviews.text: I've had the phone for about 7 months and it's time for another phone. The loud speaker quit working about 2 weeks ago. I started noticing my signal became weak about 3 months ago, and my bluetooth doesnt connect since something is wrong with the signal. I switched services and noticed the same issue.I haven't dropped my phone but I do use it alot. Battery life is awesome, phone is quick to respond when the signal works properly. Screen for video viewing is good. Overall, this is not a phone that will last in the long run. It's good for a temporary phone. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Shells

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't stay turned on for 2 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my mother, to replace her galaxy S5. From the moment I took the phone out of the box to set it up, it kept doing updates. It would turn itself off and back on during the update process. However, it shut down even when it wasn't showing that it was doing updates on the screen. It was powering off every 2 minutes. Even after I turned automatic updates off, the phone would just power off and back on every 2 minutes. I gave in and let it update. After letting all of the updates install though, it still continued to power off every 2 minutes. I'm sending it back and buying something else for her.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Rogers

customer_reviews.title: If it doesn't work, return it
customer_reviews.text: Phone I received claimed to be registered to a prior Google account. Five hours on line with tech support could not resolve, and Amazon receipt was not sufficient for factory support (because it did not specify IMEI#). Returned to Amazon and purchased from Verizon for $20 more (but they had theirs configured & working within 20 minutes). It's a great phone, but don't waste your time with tech support if it claims to be registered to another user.
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK WITH VERIZON
customer_reviews.text: Despite Item description, this Phone is INCOMPATIBLE WITH VERIZON. Went to 2 different Verizon stores and they couldn't find the IMEI#, even though the first picture of the phone says Unlocked and "GSM/CDMA compatible. Contacted Motorola support and they said it should work with Verizon, but this simply is not true. Have to return, very frustrated and will be wary of buying phones from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Clair Clark

customer_reviews.title: Moto G7 Power Unlocked
customer_reviews.text: Moto G7 Power Unlocked is my Third Motorola phone purchase. Unlocked is very important to me cause I HATE the bloatware, I have for one week, Battery Life is incredible I 've only charged one time so far. Still playing with set up so far so good. Cost from Amazon excellent deal. A lot of phone for the money. I read several reviews all excellent. I suggest buying a case. I dropped it in first 1/2 hour and not the purpose. ha ha. Big Screen has android 9 something works. I would differently recommend this phone. I'm old so take that into account. I do play games works great.
customer_reviews.author: Rik Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Awesome awesome. Super long battery lufr
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone at fantastic price. Battery life is best I have ever had. 3 days between charges at times. Built in fm radio a bonus. Finger reader 100xs better than my old iPhone or Samsung. I am using this on Mint Mobile for $180 for entire year. Brought a second one for my son. 2 awesome phones and 2 yearly plans for under $1000 when some of my foolish friends are paying way more than that for just 1 phone that I cannot see anything that great about their phone or service to justify as such a waste of hard earned money.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great decision, great battery!
customer_reviews.text: The biggest issue for me is sound quality. I listen to podcasts and the sound can sometimes be off. Otherwise I love this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: A great value
customer_reviews.text: There are some people that can benefit from the top of the line latest feature phones, but they cost 4 to 6 times more than this phone. The battery life has been exceptional, and it has all the features that I need. Thank you Motorola. Your work is greatly appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Owner Builder

customer_reviews.title: Slippery as a wet fish but a really nice phone
customer_reviews.text: The only negative with this, portrait only screen lock does not work . . .constantly flipping from landscape to portrait. Battery life and charge time are amazing, most refined phone I've owned for under 200.00. Camera is also very good. . .
customer_reviews.author: Saint Aug, FL

customer_reviews.title: ok for cost ... No Volume on speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is the Perfect phone for the cost .. Performs like high end units with brand names .. The only flaw I found is that the Volume when maxed out is barely hearable even holding the phone. I wouldnt hear it ring if it were on the table beside me if a TV or radio was on even low. Hearing it is very major.. Might have to return it over it. other than that major set back its great.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy snell

customer_reviews.title: First day of using it - so far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I turned on my phone immediately out of the box and it was already 60% charged. I put my sim in and it started to work just fine. The display (6.2 inches) is bigger than my galaxy s7 which I knew beforehand but still is nice. The biggest reason why I bought this phone was because of the 5000 mAh battery. I've only been using it a few hours and only a few percentages of battery has decreased which is awesome, my galaxy s7 would die after half a day IF that. So far I'm super pleased especially since this phone was only $180 and works just as well if not better than a $1,000 phone.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Marose

customer_reviews.title: Godlike Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: It never ever runs out juice, but the phone is a bit bulky. If you're worried about the one handability of this phone, don't because there are apps like MyGesture that allows you to use the navigation functions from the sides of the phone, so I rly recommend you install that app once you get this phone. Finally, for music lovers that wanna change tracks without glancing at the screen, Motorola included functuons that allows you to change tracks with a long press on the volume button when the screen is off. With apps like these, this phone is actually everything I've ever wanted in a phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kyeong won Min

customer_reviews.title: A million times better than Samsung or apple!!
customer_reviews.text: I owned 2 iPhones and a sumsung before this phone. After being disappointed with both companies, I felt frustrated and I ultimately picked this phone up because it was cheap. I didn't want to spend another $800-$1000 on a crappy phone. The price points should be flipped, let me tell you. This phone beats my iPhones and Samsung by a mile in every conceivable way. I like the size. It is not too bulky. It is incredibly fast and extremely user friendly. I couldn't be more impressed and I am so happy I got this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: G6 is a better buy
customer_reviews.text: Good phone for the money but there is an extremely annoying high pitch noise (2-3 seconds) emitted from the speakers after any sound is played. Also screen resolution isn't great, not terrible but G6 is deffintly better. Otherwise everything is as expected for a budget phone. I would recommend G6 over this phone. Battery life is excellent, even with normal use lasts over 2 full days.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone at an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Very excellent phone for the price paid. Upgraded from a Moto G5. Screen size and resolution are great. New added features from the last Moto. The camera is much better. Love the larger screen size. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Wow amazing
customer_reviews.text: Wow this phone is absolutely amazing! It was just under 200 and it is worth every single penny. I have this phone is super amazing I am so thankful the shipping and delivery was next day and thanks to this company I got it the next day from this person I was so happy because it is state of the art phone for 200 when phones that do less costs way more. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for price. Weak vibration... so silent mode is a pain and that's big for me.
customer_reviews.text: Overall the phone seems great for the price. I'm coming from a Samsung Galaxy S6 and this phone's bigger battery, bigger screen, and better adaptive screen lighting has been great. Only bad thing for me so far is the vibration is way too weak. Practically useless if in your pocket. There doesn't seem to be a way to increase vibration strength either.
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: abysmally awful microphone
customer_reviews.text: the microphone is unintelligible unless my mouth is directly on it. Everything else about it is amazing. The phone is nearly as powerful as my s9. The camera is very good for a budget phone. the finger card worker is perfect. the speakers sound nice. The microphone is awful and the phone doesn't pick up on headphone microphones. The battery life is easily 3-4 days for moderate use I have never gotten below 15% battery. I only have to charge the phone maybe 20 minutes a day and if I forget to charge it overnight I can survive the whole day only losing maybe 5 - 10% battery.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: Great battery and price and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first non-iPhone smart phone. I am not a techy person and I just wanted a smart phone that would not require me to sell the family Lego collection. This has been a durable, adequate and easy phone to use. The battery life is great. The camera is pretty good. The rest of my family still uses iPhones so sending videos of our kids to one another is not as easy as it was. Still, I have not regrets in moving into the Android world. So thankful for options!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality but, needs dual SIM card ability
customer_reviews.text: First off, the build quality of this phone is wonderful. The software optimization is absolutely perfect. Unfortunately, it only has 3 gigs of RAM and single SIM card ability unlike it's international version which has 4 gigs of RAM and dual SIM card ability. Dual SIM card is kind of a big deal to me even though it is not that big of a deal to most people. I was unaware of this when I purchased it and didn't return it but, for the average individual I would recommend it. It really is a beautiful phone and performs well other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Bolling

customer_reviews.title: SUPERB battery life
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the battery on thing. I can get 2 days out it fairly easy. I never have to worry about running out even if I listen to hours of music or take tons of pictures that day. I just wish Moto would have released the 4gb Ram, 64gb storage option in the US like they do for the international model. Seems pretty boneheaded to me. Great phone otherwise. I can't live without the Moto gestures now. Karater chop for the flashlight and twist for camera are awesome
customer_reviews.author: GraphixJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I have been used to. Samsug Galaxy. This phone is really Hard to learn. Nothing is easy to find, not even the volume control. Everything is ackward and I have to Google how to do everything. And it is way too big.
customer_reviews.author: Martini

customer_reviews.title: A Great Battery - A Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this is a great phone. It was a replacement for my G5 Plus. The battery life is great. I have not charged it for 36 hours and still have plenty of battery.
customer_reviews.author: Jmacmedia

customer_reviews.title: Goes for days.
customer_reviews.text: I've long been a fan of the Moto G series. As a bargain customer on Republic Wireless, being able to bring my own phone to the service was a great deal. I often use my phone to listen to audiobooks over my wireless earbuds. Sometimes for up to 8 hours a day. The battery life on this phone is amazing. Even with heavy use, I can get two and a half days out of a charge. Exactly what I wanted. This phone won't stand against the newest iPhone when it comes to specs, but it does everything your average user will need, for a fraction of the cost, while still looking and sounding great.
customer_reviews.author: Jory

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Perfect phone for anybody. Doesn't matter if no use it for work or play storage and battery are waiting for me. I do let it shut down when the battery is out before charging and it is fully charged in less than two hours.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my Samsung, this is better in every way. And it doesn't come with fifteen thousand bloated apps I can't get rid of like the Samsung, either. The gesture commands to turn on flashlight or camera are so useful that I don't know how I managed without them, and the battery life is incredible - I routinely go two or three days without needing to charge, and I'm using it all the time to play music over Bluetooth headphones and to read ebooks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Super Phone
customer_reviews.text: I like the phone very much but I am disappointed that WIFI calling does not work . I am using AT&T with this unlocked phone. Please read the blogs of the carrier you are using. If you are bringing your own unlocked phone chances are WIFI calling will not work. The carriers want you to buy their over priced bloatware cell phones. Other than that issue the phone works very well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like this phone. I've been using it for a couple days now, and it reminds me a lot of the Moto G6 I had a while back. If you've used a recent Moto G phone, you'll feel right at home with this device. My only complaint with the device is the speaker. Out of the box it sounds blown? I haven't played anything really loud or blasted music or anything, but in almost everything that comes out of it I hear buzzing and rough sound. I'm assuming this is covered under warranty? Other than that, I truly believe this is a great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M.

customer_reviews.title: Love the phone. Excellent battery and great camera
customer_reviews.text: I love the battery life and everything about the phone. Charged it Sunday night and didn't charge again until Friday night. Price was a big factor to me as well as camera and battery. Everything else is just a bonus to me. It is reasonably intuitive for the price. Has some pretty clever short cuts built in that I like
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: much better than iphone 6!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my iphone 6. This phone worked with Verizon, without any issues at all. The fingerprint reader is so good, better than the iphone fingerprint reader in my opinion. So far, the battery life is great too, lasting much longer than the iphone battery. Very happy with this purchase to replace my iphone 6.
customer_reviews.author: dh

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement/ upgrade for my wife's Moto G6. The phone responds faster then the G6 which was greatly needed update. Battery life is good so far and charges in no time. Overall satisfied with the Motorola line of budget phones. As long as they keep putting out quality phones like this I will never go back to Apple or a Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: sinsaint76

customer_reviews.title: Drops Calls, Drops Face Recognition, No attachments - JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: This phone drops calls after 1 to 7 minutes. They could be incoming or outgoing. Been going on for 3 weeks as I try to fix. I now give up. Keeps losing the face recognition settings. Text messages will not download with attachments. Other settings have to be constantly reset. Grrrrrrr!!! But it does have a good battery. Avoid Moto phones.
customer_reviews.author: Oregonaussie

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: There are plenty of good reviews on this phone which is why I purchased it however I must have received a lemon because the volume on the ringtone and notifications is barely audible. Reading back through other reviews, I saw this issue was mentioned. Sadly, I will be returning this phone and searching for another.
customer_reviews.author: dhamp

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone for the price you won't regret buying
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone I reinstalled all my previous apps from my old phone and still has tons of memory to spare. Screen is huge and even thought it's 720 you can not tell at all. I would recommend buying a screen and case for it because like any smartphone it seems a bit fragle. Battery life lasts all day even with it only being charged about 60-70% and heavy use and brightness all the way up.
customer_reviews.author: harold begay

customer_reviews.title: Nice Moto phone. GREAT BATTERY LIFE.
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Moto 7. The larger screen is a plus and the battery life is excellent. It's always hard getting used to a new phone as you are so used to the controls on your old one. This has been a pretty easy transition. I'm a big fan of Motorolas. They are reasonably priced. Good quality. And the camera on this one is better than my other Motos. You can actually zoom in! I recommend this phone if you want one that's not pricy and is unlocked.
customer_reviews.author: Cafe Farrago

customer_reviews.title: The phone was defective
customer_reviews.text: The phone would not receive incoming calls and on most occasions would not place a call. Our carrier spent hours attempting to help us get it to work. It would work for one or two calls then stop again after major resets. We returned the phone and ordered the same phone through our carrier. The phone from our carrier works perfectly and I would rate it at five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Kren

customer_reviews.title: Very good phone
customer_reviews.text: I am new to smart phones, this being my first, but I am really happy with it. My one disappointment is the microphone. Callers on the other end seem to have trouble hearing at times and I have to remember to speak loud, but overall a good phone for the price.
customer_reviews.author: G. Corbin

customer_reviews.title: that it works
customer_reviews.text: finger print reader doesnt work that great for me but i use my hands alot at work and they seem to be dry most of the time, i dont use face recognition but the phone is awesome, i retired my previous motorola due to battery life and the g7 is amazing as far as how long it will last. quality seems to be there and i like it alot
customer_reviews.author: stacy

customer_reviews.title: What they said - battery life is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this phone. It says 3-day battery and it really *is*! Beyond that. The phone is zippy and does everything I want, and fast. The only negative is I don't think the T-Mobile reception on this phone is as good as the dedicated phones I've had. If you're a T-Mobile user, be sure to take the phone to all the places where you depend on a signal, to make sure you're OK.
customer_reviews.author: Paul the music lover

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for the family. We are Moto people. Great phone for the price. Took it to VzW for quicker activation.
customer_reviews.author: kksingg

customer_reviews.title: A perfect phone for a budget
customer_reviews.text: Another excellent product made by Motorola. I had a Moto G7 supra before this phone, this Moto G7 Power is way better than Supra. Faster, and battery life is awesome. Screen size is perfect and the colors are superb. I will keep this post updated.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Olivera

customer_reviews.title: does NOT work with Xfinity!
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea if this is a good phone because I've never used it (ignore the star rating). However, I felt impelled to inform Xfinity customers that this phone from Amazon is not compatible with Xfinity mobile despite the fact that the otherwise exact same phone is listed on their website as compatible. I was told by an Xfinity rep that I could buy it outside. But when I called in my IMEI number I was told that "the technology is not compatible" without any further explanation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmmmmm.....
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as my first Moto g 7. Disappointed actually. The voice messaging does not work unless I turn on extra data. Even though I tried calling to fix that. And this is really weird....one of my contacts gets "dialed" without me ever calling her. I had to delete the contact ( as I only call her once a year). Typing also skips alot. Too complicated to return it, but will not be purchasing this phone again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy H.

customer_reviews.title: Good battery life, slow wi-fi connection
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old smartphone (Moto G5 Plus) with this one. Good battery life and CPU performance (tested on heavy number-crunching parallel prime-factorization algo), but device is rather heavy, lacks dual-SIM, slow wi-fi connection (had problems with wi-fi calling).
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Bell

customer_reviews.title: Incredible deal!
customer_reviews.text: We love these phones. Battery life is incredible. Cameras are adequate and so are the screens. The price we paid for these phones makes this deal fantastic. Phones are nice looking also.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product.
customer_reviews.text: I could never connect the phone to our WiFi. I even changed our WiFi passcode, thinking that I had forgotten it. Still no connection. When using the phone over LTE, I tried to play a couple of YouTube videos. Both times, the app dropped after 10 seconds. Horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Auerbach

customer_reviews.title: Works good for me so far
customer_reviews.text: I had a Moto phone for 3 years, so when I needed to upgrade, I chose this brand. The interface has improved. The phone works fast. Excellent battery life. What may not work for some people: it's big; the camera is good but not great, especially at night.
customer_reviews.author: Irina Avkh
